overview: Elder Dudley has received an invitation to join a secret organization within the church called The Order. If he wants to become a member and receive the higher priesthood authority, he must follow all the required steps. Unsure of what awaits him, he knows he must show complete obedience to join. Finding himself in the unfamiliar doctrinal territory, he has little choice but to place his trust in his priesthood leaders.
title: Elder Dudley: Chapters 1-4
